articles.author: By Maureen O'Hare, CNN
articles.title: 2 of the world's wealthiest countries shoot to the top of 'very high' risk travel list - CNN
articles.description: As Omicron continues to rage around the world, the tiny European countries of Monaco and San Marino have shot to the top of the CDC's "very high" risk travel list. Here is the latest news this week from CNN Travel.
articles.content: CNN's Forrest Brown, Tamara Hardingham-Gill, Lilit Marcus, Sheena McKenzie, Andy Rose, Francesca Street and Yong Xiong contributed to this report. Top image: Monaco's natural harbor (Photo by Adobe S… [+4 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: COVID vaccination hesitancy inspires some of Europe’s most bizarre rules - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Efforts in Europe to encourage vaccine use through certificates proving vaccination, a negative test result or evidence of having had COVID have created a mountain of regulation.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jasmine Hicks
articles.title: Astronomers discover largest group of 'rogue planets' yet - The Verge
articles.description: Telescopes from the European Southern Observatory and other facilities caught a glimpse of dozens of rogue planets not tethered to stars. Using 20 years' worth of data, the telescopes were able to spot at least 70 planets while they were still hot enough to g…
articles.content:
Several billion of these free-floating giants could exist
